```{r}
Data <- read_csv("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
View(Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=Data, aes(x=Year, y= 'Incident Recorded', group= 1))+
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", title = "Incidents Recorded Over Years")
```
